name: Whoami Execution
description: Detects the execution of whoami, which is often used by attackers after exploitation / privilege escalation but rarely used by administrators
false_positives: Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\whoami.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:whoami.exe)`
